statement: Open Lending Corp, a company that provides lending enablement and risk analytics solutions, has faced a significant stock drop of 58% after it revealed negative revenue and underperforming loans in its historic vintages. A proposed class action lawsuit alleges that the company misrepresented its profit-sharing revenue and hid the underperformance of its loans. The company's stock price plummeted to $1.17 a share, missing analysts' estimates. The company's Q4 2024 earnings report showed a net loss of $144.4 million, leading to a decline in stock price. Several law firms have launched investigations and class-action lawsuits against the company, claiming that investors were misled by the company's financial statements.
introduction: Open Lending Corp's stock price plummeted 58% after it reported negative revenue and underperforming loans, leading to a proposed class action lawsuit alleging the company misrepresented its profits and hid loan performance issues.

statement: ENDRA Life Sciences Inc. (NDRA) is a company that develops Thermo Acoustic Enhanced UltraSound (TAEUS) technology, which characterizes tissue similar to an MRI, but at a lower cost. The company is focused on improving clinical diagnostic ultrasound and developing technologies to treat nonalcoholic fatty liver disease and tissue composition. ENDRA has announced a strategy to enable early detection and management of metabolic diseases facilitated by emerging GLP-1 therapies. The company has reported its first quarter 2024 financial results and provided a business update.
introduction: ENDRA Life Sciences develops Thermo Acoustic Enhanced UltraSound (TAEUS) technology for low-cost tissue characterization, focusing on nonalcoholic fatty liver disease and metabolic disease detection and management.

statement: JELD-WEN Holding, Inc., a leading global manufacturer of building products, has been recognized on Newsweek's list of "Most Trustworthy Companies in America" for the fourth consecutive year. JELD-WEN offers a range of products, including interior and exterior doors, windows, and related building products, and has established a strong presence in the construction industry.
introduction: JELD-WEN Holding, Inc. has been recognized as one of the "Most Trustworthy Companies in America" for the fourth consecutive year, a distinction that reflects its commitment to quality, sustainability, and community involvement.

statement: Impact Biomedical Inc. is a biotechnology company that discovers, develops, and patents healthcare solutions through research, licensing, and collaborations.
